diff: +		// Notify the compiler that the working copy was modified, so that the editor
+		// and any downstream compilationParticipants will get a recomputed AST,
+		// taking into account any changes to generated types.
+		//TODO: don't call unless generated types were changed - WSH 10/06

members.signatureBeforeChange: private void saveCompilationUnit(IPackageFragment pkgFrag, final String cuName, String contents, 			IProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
members.signatureAfterChange: private void saveCompilationUnit(IPackageFragment pkgFrag, final String cuName, String contents, 			IProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
diff: +			// Cover the case where the user turned off reconcile-time processing after some working
+			// copies were already created - else they'll get null timestamps and the commit will fail.
+			// There's probably a better way to do this but it's a corner case anyway. - WSH 3/07
